Summary: I saw a bright light descending toward the ground
divs: sighting detailsaround 9pm on july 18, 2008 the dogs were barking and growling, so i went into my office to look out the west facing window, and saw no one. further to the west i saw a bright yellow-white light descending toward the earth. this light was approx. 1\2 inch long and maybe 100 ft. up, and was descending straight down, like a vtol does. about a half mile from my house is a pg&e sub=station, then a bare field of 5-6 acres, then an orchard. there is a house in the trees, but between what would be my line of sight and the house is another bldg. so i doubt i could see those lights. there is a light from a service station at the corner that i see all the time, but this new light was several hundred ft. north of that light. i could see both lights. i watchd this for 30-45 min. during which time it dimmed several times, and once blinked out completely. this morning i dared to drive down the dirt road, but could see not difinitive evidence of a landing. perhaps though i was not at the right spot. i also had another sighting on 7-9-2008, that may be related in some way. at 3 am i was getting a drink and looked out the window which faces east. in the south east a mile or more away was a bright light that seemed to be blinking, so i watched thinking it was almost as if a string of lights were blinking in sequence. after maybe 10 minutes i went back to my computer. maybe 45 min. later i went back to take a peek and the light was now a bare quarter mile away, hanging ove the pasture area, at an elevation of (as a guess) 10-20,000 ft. there was no soound that i could hear. now i could clearly see that the lights were 'running' around the center of whatever was there. after about 5 min. the lights stopped and just two steady lights, like auto headlights appeared. they remained for 3-4 seconds, then the 'running lights' appeared again. i opened the door for a clearer view and watched for nearly an hour while the running lights alternated with the auto headlight sequence. all this time the light did not move across the sky as a star or plane or satellite would. it was still doing it's thing when i decided to go on to bed if it wasn't going to put on any new antics. could hese two incidences be related in some way.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lockeford
There were no other sightings in Lockeford on or around July 18th 2008
